channel.title: Homekit on Christoph Hartmann
channel.description: Recent content in Homekit on Christoph Hartmann

item.title: HomeKit for Fritz!Box smart home devices
item.description: Every year at Christmas, I get some time to play with new exiting stuff. This year, I decided to play with my smart home devices. And of course, some intelligent personal assistant needs to be part of it. Right now, I prefer devices from AVM Fritz! since their devices have a track record for long-term maintenance. They have one disadvantage though: A missing Apple HomeKit integration. Let’s fix that.
